channel.title: The Buckets Guide on Buckets
channel.description: Recent content in The Buckets Guide on Buckets

item.title: FAQ
item.description: What limitations does the trial version have? The trial version of Buckets includes these limitations: The app has a little yellow sticker in the bottom left side of the window Every budget will include a Buckets License bucket to help you save up for a license After a while, will periodically remind you to buy the full version. Otherwise, the trial version is identical to the full version.

item.title: File Format
item.description: NOTE: This article is intended for programmers who want to write programs that interface with budget files. You don't need this if you just want to use the Buckets app. Buckets budget files are SQLite databases. The schema is mostly self-explanatory, but this document points out some things that aren’t. WARNING: The schema is not final and may change without warning in future versions of Buckets. If you still have questions after reading this, feel free to chat with me.
